original: Kathaṁ bhikkhu sammā so loke paribbajeyya”.
analyzed: katham bhikkhu sammā saḥ loke paribbajeyya
saḥ a nissitaḥ an añña neyyaḥ

original: No ca bhikkhu hiṁseyya kañci loke;
analyzed: no ca bhikkhu hiseyya kañci loke
vagga gatesu na vagga sāri dhīraḥ
addhā hi bhagavā tathā iva eta
sabba sa yojana yoga vīti vatto
